summary: A successful but world-weary art dealer finds out that her usual masseur has sent a substitute for her regular weekly massage at her home. They find that they are both mutually attracted, and annoy one another a great deal.
cast: Mimi Rogers|Bryan Brown|Christopher Burgard|Elizabeth Barondes|Gareth Williams|Patrick Neil Quinn|Heather Gunn|Gabriella Hall|Brian McLane|William Fuller|Lynette Bennett|Rachel Nolin|Michael Edmonds|Ross McKerras|Mike Nyman

title: El masaje
